Edit.Name: prpSetSystemTimeFromGPS
Edit.Caption: Use GPS time
Edit.Help: If enabled sets the clock of the computer to the GPS time once a fix is set. This is only necessary if your computer does not have a real-time clock with battery backup or your computer frequently runs out of battery power or otherwise loses time.

Edit.Name: prpIgnoreNMEAChecksum
Edit.Caption: Ignore checksum
Edit.Help: If your GPS device outputs invalid NMEA checksums, this will allow it's data to be used anyway
